definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Merely lid. How trivial it is.
Will you please tidy up all the odds and ends on the table.
sentences.chinese: 請你把桌上那些零瑣細碎的工具都收拾起來吧。

sentences.english: There are trivial variations in a few commands.
sentences.chinese: 有一些指令的瑣細的變更。

sentences.english: Unnecessary haggling over relatively trivial issues is less and less prevalent.
sentences.chinese: 在較瑣細的問題上不必要的討價還價日益減少。

sentences.english: The children's quarrels usually concern a petty problem.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子們爭吵常常只是因爲瑣細的問題。

sentences.english: Each of us can only live in day-to-day and trivial lives.
sentences.chinese: 我們每個人都只能生活在日常的瑣細之中。
